english.segment1: I was in need and I needed a friend. I was alone and I needed a hand. I was going down. But someone rescued me
english.segment2: Chorus: My God cares too much to say. His mercies are new everyday. I get down to pray. And then help is on its way
english.segment3: I walk by faith and not by sight. If things go wrong, itll be alright. Cause someone greater. Is watching over me. (Chorus)
english.segment4: Coda: Now in faith, I believe. Ive got everything I need. I walk by faith and not by what I see. Ive got friends in high places. Ive got someone I can call. And Ive got someone watching over me. (Verse)
